verses.1:
Ahy Jesosy Tompo ary Azy aho
Fitiavana no fanevany
Fitiavana no fanevany eo amiko
verses.2:
Mitondra amoron-drano
Fialan-tsasatra Izy
Fitiavana no fanevany (in-3)
Fitiavana no fanevany eo amiko.
verses.3:
Manome ahy Fanahy Masina Izy
Fitiavana no fanevany (in-3)
Fitiavana no fanevany eo amiko.
verses.4:
Tiako hianao ary hianao tia ahy
Fitiavana no fanevany (in-3)
Fitiavana no fanevany eo amiko.
